text: Hi, I want to know how to get articles by tag in HubSpot CMS BLOG.thanks
and what's is the problem so far?
is the crm showing up on the deals page?
No, I am not able to do customization and also crm is not displaying on deal page.
what do you mean you're not able to do customization? also did you install your app on the portal (and request oauth?)?
Yes, I have connected my test account with oAuth and on deal page it's showing Powerred by "MyApp". But not getting CRM to be loaded.

do you want to setup a test by sending data to <http://webhook.site|webhook.site>?

I have setup webhook but i don't want that process. My Scenario is that if i create any deal then I'll click on one button that will open one modal with a form and we will hit to send data to our app. That modal we are not able to setup in our account

Does someone know how to get the contact owner property inside a form? The weird thing is, is that it is blocked, but I currently have one project where we have the HubSpot Contact owner as hidden form field.. No idea how we did that though hahaha. Is there some kind of workaround?
